EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Discover the Power of TriTech.com IQ
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> Discover the Power of TriTech.com IQ COMPLIMENTARY LIVE WEBINAR Approved for 1 NAAC CEU Thank you for registering for our TriTech.com IQ product demonstration. You will receive a reminder email one day prior to the live webinar. Your webinar information is listed to the right.
JOIN LINK: {{member.webinar url:default=Login Link}}
DATE: Thursday, April 11, 2013
TIME: 2 PM ET l 1 PM CT l Noon MT l 11 AM PT
SPEAKERS: Wendy Gilbert, Director of Product Management
Charlie Barry, Senior Product Manager
AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial in over the telephone to the number shown on your screen after login
Wendy and Charlie look forward to showcasing our exciting new product on Thursday, April 11 and are glad you've decided to join.
See you online on April 11th!
Questions? Cheri Lane, Marketing Communication Manager 800-537-3927, ext. #6278 cheri.lane@tritech.com <http://direct.tritech.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtYS00OTcmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTQ5NyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTg0ODY1MjUmc2VyaWFsPTEzMDAyMDM5OTUmZW1haWxpZD1qZW5ueS5jbGF2ZXJvQHRyaXRlY2guY29tJnVzZXJpZD1hLTgwLTM5OTkyLTE2MTcyNS0xJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&mailto:cheri.lane@tritech.com?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRolv6rBZKXonjHpfsX57e0qW6Kg38431UFwdcjKPmjr1YYCTMN0dvycMRAVFZl5nRhKE%2FSQf4g%3D>
